purpose: To provide a flexible and efficient programming language that leverages generative AI to enhance software development and automate coding tasks.
principle: Built on the principle of empowering developers with AI-assisted tools that streamline coding processes and improve productivity through intelligent code generation.
reusability: Encourages code reusability through modular design and the ability to integrate with various languages and frameworks, allowing developers to leverage existing codebases effectively.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include limited features and stability issues. Performance may vary based on the complexity of the tasks and the integration with external libraries.
name: agentlang-clj
highlight: Integrates generative AI capabilities directly into the programming language to enhance code generation and automation.
